document.full_text: novak djokovic extended his perfect season right into the french open, beating thiemo de bakker 6-2, 6-1, 6-3 monday in the first round.
document.title: novak djokovic rolls, extends 2011 winning streak to 38-0
lines_and_colors: novak djokovic extended his perfect season right into the french open, beating thiemo de bakker 6-2, 6-1, 6-3 monday in the first round.
